headline: Fortinet Recognized as a Leader in 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Enterprise Wired, Wireless LAN Infrastructure
summary: Fortinet Inc. (NASDAQ:FTNT) is one of the high profit margin stocks to buy now. On June 30, Fortinet announced its recognition as a Leader in the 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Enterprise Wired and Wireless LAN Infrastructure. This marks the second consecutive year Fortinet has received this distinction. The company attributes this achievement to its […]
